response.name: Get Account
response.body:
{
    "code": "00",
    "success": true,
    "message": "Retrieved Successfully",
    "data": {
        "id": 3446,
        "walletGroupId": 23,
        "customerId": 1232,
        "availableBalance": 0,
        "ledgerBalance": 0,
        "walletRestrictionId": null,
        "walletClassificationId": 1,
        "currencyId": 1,
        "isInternal": false,
        "isDefault": false,
        "name": "Yoyo's Account",
        "overdraft": null,
        "virtualAccount": {
            "accountNumber": "0000034461",
            "bankCode": "101101",
            "bankName": "78 Finance Company Limited"
        },
        "mobNum": "3446",
        "customerTypeId": null
    }
}

exec: pm.test("Validate the response schema for the required fields", function () {
pm.test("Account number in virtual account is a non-empty string", function () {
pm.test("Bank code and bank name in virtual account are non-empty strings", function () {

body.raw:
{
    "walletGroupId": 23, //account type id, it is optional but if you are going to be using the chart of account feature, you must specify one
    "customerId": 1506,
    "walletClassificationId": 2, //1 = customer account, 2 = internal account
    "currencyId": 1, // 1 = NGN
    "name": "{{$randomFullName}}" // an optional name for the account
}
